title: Maharani Kundan Haaram with Emerald Accents
materials: and Simulated Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Elaborate floral motifs crafted with intricate Kundan setting. Features a central oval-shaped Emerald surrounded by shimmering simulated diamonds. Antique finish detailing enhances the vintage charm. Beautifully cascading gold bead dangles add a touch of movement and elegance.
colors: and Sparkling White (Simulated Diamonds). A classic and timeless color palette.
occasions: and other significant celebrations. Ideal for Muhurtham ceremonies and grand social gatherings. Can also be worn for upscale cultural events and festivals.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship with attention to detail. The timeless design and high-quality materials ensure this piece will be treasured for generations. Combines traditional Kundan artistry with a modern sensibility. Adds a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble. The contrast of Emeralds and simulated diamonds creates a striking visual appeal. A true statement piece reflecting rich South Indian heritage.
